transit: A close walk to the Plaza de Catalunya (15 min), this area is best known for its bohemian vibe, local artist studios, multi-cultural restaurants, quaint cafes and a few trendy clubs. The metro takes you all over the city, including to La Sagrada Familia (15 minutes), where you'll find many of Barcelona’s most famous museums, cathedrals and art galleries. It’s a lovely walk to The Maritime Museum (8 min), Guell Palace (7 min) and the Aquarium (13 min). The Drassanes metro stop is 7 minutes away on foot, and buses run around the corner.

host.host_about: We are Sweet Inn and we offer a unique hospitality experience. We have over 500 stylish apartments for vacations and business trips in 10 incredible European cities. We’ve hosted thousands of guests since 2014 - so rest assured, you won’t have any unpleasant surprises. Spoiler Alert: Our apartments are professionally designed for the ultimate comfort - heavenly beds, the fluffiest towels, toiletries by Nuxe, a Nespresso machine, super-fast WiFi and tons of other perks; trust me, you’ll notice the difference. Two more things you should know about Sweet Inn: We have a City Lobby and a local team in every city that will take the best care of you; we’ll even personally meet you at the apartment to show you in. And we’ll help you make the most out of your stay in Barcelona with tips only a local would know. We also offer incredible services to upgrade your stay - airport transfer, housekeeping, full fridge, private chef and many more. One last thing, download our App after booking, it’s really great; it will make your experience so much smoother.

neighborhood_overview: Recreio dos Bandeirantes é um dos bairros mais jovens do Rio de Janeiro, e faz parte da região administrativa da Barra da Tijuca, sendo conhecido pelo ambientalismo, organização, segurança, praias e a prática de esportes aquáticos. Lugar ideal para passear pela orla, andar de bicicleta, de skate, pegar um solzinho, surfar, fazer uma trilha. As praias do Recreio são as melhores da cidade, estão sempre próprias para banho, possuem uma boa infraestrutura de quiosques e uma extensa faixa de areia para os banhistas. Os principais atrativos do Recreio são: Praia da Reseva, Praia do Recreio, Pedra do Pontal, Praia da Macumba, Secreto, Prainha, Abricó e Grumari. Você pode fazer esse percurso todo de bike. Além disso, é fácil o acesso ao transporte público para outros pontos da cidade.
transit: O local conta com linhas de ônibus circulantes pela orla, e também pela avenida principal (Av. das Américas). Conta ainda com o BRT, e na Barra é possível acessar o metrô. Disponibilidade de Taxis, Ubers e afins.  Além das bikes pra locação do Itaú.
interaction: Nos veremos pessoalmente nas estregas de chave. Além disso nos colocamos a disposição para eventuais dúvidas, dicas de passeios, e pra socializar.

neighborhood_overview: Está situado en un lugar lleno de museos y plazas bonitas de Barcelona . The area is vibrant, historic, authentic and full of personality. It is a lively, multi-cultural neighbourhood with a huge variety of tempting cafes, restaurants and bars. The area has also become fashionable being host to a wide variety of art studios, galleries and trendy bookshops, not to mention the imposing MACBA (museum of modern art) and CCCB which is the neighbouring exhibition centre. Clothes shopping is also a pleasure in El Raval thanks to the little one-off boutiques that line some of the streets giving you a truly unique shopping experience. Unlike the Eixample with its large branded name designer labels, Raval is where you find the small privately owned shops selling clothes you can't find anywhere else. El Raval is alive all through the day and night so you will never be without an eatery to entice you in the early hours of the morning. El Raval offers a central location within walking distance of m
transit: The best way to get to the apartment is by taxi. From the airport it usually costs about 25-30€.  At the city now there you can also move by Cabify If you come by car there’s a parking right next to the apartment.  In case you prefer METRO you should get to PLAZA CATALUNYA L1 metro station.
access: El apartamento es disponible entero para mis visitantes )))

reviews.comments: Melissa was very easy to communicate with and responded promptly to messages. The exchange of keys was also very simple and stress free. The neighborhood was decent, with the C train only a block away. The building in which the listing is located is not the greatest in terms of appearance and upkeep.  The apartment itself was clean and well kept with plenty of room for guests to store personal items.  She had fresh towels ready for us on arrival, and the bed linens smelled freshly washed as well.  Our only complaint was that the bed was actually more of a futon than an actual bed and was a bit of a tight fit for my 6' 3" husband and myself. That being said the mattress itself was very comfortable and we were so exhausted that we slept fine despite that.  Overall this place was sufficient for what we needed it for - a place to crash for the night.  I wouldn't necessarily have wanted to stay there for any longer than that.

L'appartamento di Melissa è proprio come appare nelle foto. Abbiamo trascorso un gradevole soggiorno presso il suo appartamento. Vicinissimo alla metropolitana. Melissa è stata molto disponibile: ci ha lasciato a disposizione attrezzi per cucinare, quanto c'era in frigo e quant'altro presente nell'appartamento. Check-in e check-out molto flessibili. Nonostante avessimo tardato per il check-in a causa di un problema con la metropolitana, lei era lì ad attenderci senza alcun problema; per il check-out ci ha consentito di utilizzare l'appartamento fino a tardo pomeriggio così che potessimo lasciare lì i bagagli per un'ultima uscita in New York. Consigliato.

Melissa has an awesome flat in a beautiful neighbourhood which is really easy to bike or train to the city from. The bed is comfortable and the bathrooms and kitchens well appointed. The building feels really safe and quiet, would definitely recommend staying here.

Melissa was a very helpful, welcoming host. She was always answering all my questions very fast, also during the booking-process on airbnb. Melissa even offered me a reduced price for my stay, as I stayed for a longer term. The apartment looks exactly as on the pictures, the space itself felt even bigger than on the images. The apartment is very clean and Melissa provided us with everything we needed for our stay. As the apartment faces a small inner yard, the apartment is really quiet (no street noise at all!); you can just hear a air-con from a neighboring building which didn't bother me at all. The bed was just perfect - not too big, but totally ok. There is plenty of storage in the apartment (two wall closets, two dressers). The location couldn't be more perfect: the C train is just around the corner, the G and all atlantic terminal trains are just a few blocks away. There is even a citibike-station just around the corner as well. On several streets around the apartment there are plenty of good grocery stores (try out Mr. Melon) and restaurants (try Chuko). I enjoyed my stay at Melissas place very much and would definitely recommend her place! If you have any questions about Melissas apartment as a tenant, feel free to contact me!

Спасибо огромное Мелиссе за прием! 
Отличная квартира- есть все, что необходимо. Чисто и уютно! Отличное расположение, метро - 200 метров (линия С и А). До центра Манхетана 25 минут на метро. 
Рядом много продуктовых магазинчиков, на углу улицы  милый итальянский ресторанчик. 
Всем советую!

I didn't get to know Melissa because of my late flights but she was always available when I needed her. The apartment is as described in AirBnb and convenient for the subway. It's only a short walk away from the C train stop and there is a Citi Bike station very close. The apartment is equipped with everything a traveler would need, even for a long stay and the old heating which is a bit noisy sometimes works properly. The bedroom is large and filled with plenty of storage. The bedding is comfortable and the Internet access is fast and reliable. There are several places to buy or have food around the apartment and the nearest supermarket is not too far. I have to say that I enjoyed staying at Melissa's place and would recommend it.

neighborhood_overview: Eixample is a beautiful area of the city which includes some of the most popular attractions and iconic monuments in Barcelona. This district lies in the center of Barcelona, above Ciutat Vella and below the district of Gràcia. Running through the heart of Eixample is the famed Passeig de Gràcia, a long thoroughfare that houses some of Barcelona’s most exclusive shopping and is home to some of Gaudí’s most famous works like Casa Batlló and Casa Milà. At the end, you will come to Plaça Catalunya, one of the most visited places in Barcelona. Another monument that should not be missed in Eixample is La Sagrada Família, possibly the most recognized building in Barcelona and an icon of the city. With so much to see and do, no wonder Eixample is so popular!
notes: Check ins after 21:00 has an extra cost: -After 21:00: 35€ -After 23:30: 50€ (available upon request) Tourist tax of 2,48€/person/night is not included in the price of the apartment. Clients will have to pay the amount on check in. for more information: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Check ins are done in our office located in CALLE BAILEN 120, LOCAL DERECHO, BARCELONA 08009 near the metro of Verdaguer. Clients have to pass our office BEFORE going to the apartment.
transit: The nearest underground station are: Arc de Triomf (L1) and Urquinaona (L1 y L4). There are also several bus lines going to downtown Barcelona and the beaches.

interaction: Kahuku Village is located on the North Shore area of the island of Oah’u. The North Shore is world famous for its lush green vistas of mountains and sweeping view of the ocean and some of the best golfing and surfing in the world can be found here. Wandering through Kahuku also reveals a rich cultural and agricultural history of the area, evidenced in the colorful marketplace stalls, shrimp trucks, and former sugar plantation buildings located throughout the Village. Kahuku Village is comprised of three adjacent neighborhoods: New Camp, Ocean View, and Highway Makai. All neighborhoods offer the opportunity for new construction country plantation homes within a gated community and the North Shore laid back, relaxed lifestyle.  Surf, sun, and relaxation await you.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
We stayed with Carlos in his apartment for four nights ov (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) New Year. The room was large with air conditioning and the rest of the flat was tidy and with everything you would expect. The flat is in a large block with secure access and very quiet. The location is excellent in Ipanema with only a short walk to  beach and loads of good places to eat and drink nearby.

Carlos, his wife and two dogs were perfect hosts inviting us to join them for New Year celebrations which was a lot of fun.

I would highly recommend renting Carlos' apartment to anyone looking for a little slice of Rio life.

My friend Kristina and I stayed in Rio for 10 days during Carnaval and felt we stayed in the best place possible.  The location is excellent - it is safe and just a few blocks from the beach and 1-3 blocks from the various Carnaval block parties that took place which allowed us to enjoy Carnaval amongst locals.  The building is also in a 24-hr. secure, gated building.  The apartment was clean and beautifully decorated and Carlos and Giane were the sweetest and most accommodating hosts.  We had the time of our life here and highly recommend this room for anyone looking to stay in Rio.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The hostess Giane is very nice. Clean and quiet apartment, convenient location -- 5 mins walk to the center of ipanema and metro station. Absolutely enjoyed our stay here over the carnival.

Giane was checking in appropriately to make sure that I had everything I needed. The room was very comfortable and the apartment is located in a great neighborhood of Rio. I enjoyed staying here and had no issues. I'd definitely stay here again!

Comfortable apartment in a great area, we felt very safe walking around. The area is super convenient for the metro, buses and Ipanema beach. The building has 24hr security and everyone we met was really friendly.

I had a great stay in Ipanema! Giane is very helpful and a great host. The room is perfect, just like it was described in the pictures. Fully equipped with AC, TV and wifi. The apartment is in a great location, close to the beach, shopping, restaurants and services. The neighborhood feels safe and friendly. I certainly recommend this room for a vacation in Rio!

GIane is a wonderfull & charming  hostess: she made everything to make me feel at home.
I had a wonderfull breakfast everymorning and let me do a late check in and check out !
i defenitvely recommand it place for a trip in rio !!!

Giane is a very lovely and social person who will happily show you her favourite spots and night life around Ipanema. The 2 dogs are gorgeous & the house was well equipped for all my needs & in the perfect location for the metro, shops & beach, while still being far enough away from the busy strip of Ipanema main. I would happily stay with Giane again.

Giane is a lovely person, but she has two dogs living full time in her tiny apartment.  One is very old, sick and can't walk so toilet issues are a problem.  I discovered that she had showered the dog in the same shower as I was using (only one shower) to wash off faeces and urine.  As they don't go outside to toilet, the smell was an issue, as poo and pee would sit on the newspaper all day.  The mattress had blood and sweat stains, so slept with my sarong over the sheet.  I think these issues need to be addressed before she continues to do Airbnb.  As I said, she is. lovely person, but I only stayed four out of the seven nights I booked, as preferred to stay with friends rather than sleep on the mattress.

Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. summary: Non-renovated City View Studio on the 18th Floor! neighborhood_overview: El apartamento está ubicado en el centro de Poble Sec. Esta zona de Barcelona se está cambiando mucho, el Ayuntamiento a puesto por cambiarlo para que sea mas agradable para pasear e ir en bicicleta. Ya tiene esta calle buen comercio y muchos restaurantes. Poble Sec está famoso por sus autenticos bares de tapas y aqui puedes disfrutar de comer tapas de la forma tradicional en Barcelona, lejos del turismo masivo.

name: 默默|sushe素舍  万象城/罗湖口岸/三地铁口/粤港美食/商旅首选一室一厅公寓
summary: hi~ 您所浏览的【素舍】 是一间温馨安静的小屋…… 现代简约而朴素的装饰､小巧而温暖的卧室､使用方便且透亮干净的浴室,全套家电厨具,房间对面既是深圳最大的购物万象城商圈,800米范围即是深圳最老的美食街——东门步行街,非常适合商旅出差或者两个人安静的度过一段小时光~
space: 房屋位于罗湖中心区的万象城商圈,不管是去香港还是在深圳各地购物､美食度假都极其便利,旁边就是高档商业街——万象城｡从房屋步行到周围地铁站只需5分钟,无论去到哪里,选择哪种交通方式都非常方便｡ 房屋属于整套公寓出租,大面积一室一厅,房间厨房配有全套厨具用品,让你在异地他乡也能品尝到【家的味道】,房间床上用品全部采用純棉,非常亲肤柔软,让您的睡眠质量大大提高｡当然100兆的光纤必不可少,你玩累了还坐在浪漫舒适的吊篮和充气沙发上思考人生…… 房间配有一次性的洗浴用品和牙刷,而且质量都是经过我们严格筛选的｡浴巾毛巾床单都是一客一换并经过专业的杀菌洗涤｡ 配有洗衣机冰箱,方便热爱生活的您｡楼宇设置智能化管理,凭密码自助入住,充分保障独立的清静空间,24小时门卫让你加倍安全,房子门外设置24小时闭路监控,安心居住｡

neighborhood_overview: ★罗湖万象城,步行只需3分钟; Vientiane City-3mins by walk ★距离地标地王,罗湖国贸､金光华､罗湖服装城商圈,均在步行约10分钟的距离; This is central and origin district of SZ city, such as Diwang Mansion, International Trade Commercial Building, Kingglory Plaza etc. around 10mins on foot. ★距离罗湖口岸仅1.8公里,喜欢去香港､购物等的朋友的不二优选;距离福田高铁站仅4站地铁,方便高铁出行｡ Near to Luohu customhouse of Hongkong(1.8kilo). 4 stations if you take subway line 2 to Futian High-speed train station.  ★典型粤菜美食选择均在步行千米范围内｡ Full of typical Cantonese and international food restaurant  ★如果商务出行,这里举例世界金融中心､地王､京基100等甲级写字楼均在1公里范围内,楼下有公交站,打车也很方便,出行非常便利｡ Metro and bus stations are all very near. Pls refer to below section about convenient traffic.
notes: 1､我家可以做饭,正在配置厨具中…… 2､聚会生日布置需要缴纳300元押金｡ 3､加人50元一人｡
transit: ★打车请告诉司机:罗湖城市天地广场或者金威大厦 Taxi to CHENGSHI TIANDI PLAZA or JINWAY MANSION ★自驾请导航:罗湖城市天地广场;小区有充足停车位 Navigation set to CHENGSHI TIANDI PLAZA, the map attached with photos. ★公交站:金威大厦 Bus station name: JINWAY MANSION ★地铁:1､2号线大剧院地铁站F出口,1号线国贸地铁站E出口(步行600米),9号线鹿丹村站(步行600米) Metro line 1: station of Guo Mao, exit E, 600meters Metro line 2: station of Grand Theatre, exit F,900meters Metro line 9:station of Ludancun,700meters
access: 我家是整租房哦,房间设施都是可以用的哟~
interaction: 随时可以联系我哟,一小时内回复处理

host.host_about: 90后小房东,热爱旅行和摄影,喜欢吃和分享｡希望将旅行路上的一切定格,希望我的小小空间能为您短暂的停留带来方便和不一样的旅行体验｡

reviews.comments:
入住當日下午才通知我們沒有房了｡既然沒有房又爲什麼要把房源放上來? 然後便告訴我們他有另外的房子可以租給我們,不過卻要補回差價｡更過分的是,那間房子不但環境很差,而且更沒有廚房｡

這次體驗真是極差!

name: SWEET HOME NEXT TO SAGRADA FAMILIA
summary: MINIMUM 32 DAYS This beautiful renovated apartment is located only a few minutes from Sagrada Familia in the center of Barcelona and is perfect for families and quiet groups.  The apartment is extremely quiet for its central location, it has lots of natural light as both bedrooms and the living room are exterior. The apartment has a capacity of maximum four persons and is fully equipped to have a pleasant stay.
space: The apartment is located only a few minutes from the Sagrada Familia in the center of Barcelona and is perfect for families and quiet groups. Fully equipped to have a pleasant stay. It has 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.

If you are looking to experience the world-renowned reputation of Barcelona
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample district of Barcelona in the 19th century is the birthplace of the Modernist movement, of which Antoni Gaudi is considered the leader. If you are looking to experience the world-renowned reputation of Barcelona for leading the architecture of the 19th century, this area is magnificent. With all the monuments of Gaudi within reach, such as the impressive Sagrada Familia, the two famous houses of Gaudi: La Pedrera and the Apple of Discord; the Hospital of Santa Creu i Sant Pau in expansion, you will be able to spend hours walking and contemplating it. This area decorated with grilles was created in the nineteenth century to accommodate the growing population of the old Barcelona; fortunately, this coincided with the golden age of Barcelona's architecture ... Gaudí, Puig i Cadafalch, Domènech i Montaner were hired by the rich to build houses, each time more daring ... The Eixample district is divided in two, the Eixample Dreta (right side) and the Eixample Esquerra (left side
notes: The apartment is located only a few minutes from the Sagrada Familia in the center of Barcelona and is perfect for families and quiet groups. Fully equipped to have a pleasant stay.
interaction: Check in is between 15h and 00h. We are happy to try and accomodate different check in times if needed, just let us know and we will do our best.

name: cozy room in Taksim Istanbul
summary: Welcome if you want to stay at a cozy flat in the center of Istanbul. The neighborhood is safe and close to attractions.Transportation is easy. There are many markets,restaurants in the neighborhood.3 min walk to the most famous Street of Istanbul .
space: Hello, I am 28 years old female, graduated from Bogazici University and working now..   My flat is in Taksim, center of the city, which is a convenient district 3 minutes walking distance to Taksim Square, the center of touristic attraction and nightlife in Istanbul. Metro station: 3 min walk Bus station: 4 min walk Tram Station “Fındıklı”: 5 min walk Old city: 15 min Istiklal Street: 3 min walk Easy to access to other touristic areas of Istanbul. You can directly take tram to g oto Sultanahmet area where historical things are. Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar is 15 min. away by bus or tram. You can also walk from here to those places. It's also close to Nisantasi, (15 minutes walk) a chic, famous neighborhood for shopping and dining. It takes 5 min walk to go to the sea coast, Bosphorus and enjoy the nice weather.  IT takes about 5 minutes to walk to Dilmer Language Center. Istiklal Street is 3 minutes away.  University transportation is easy. Bogazici Uni

host.host_about:
I graduated from Bogazici University with a Physics degree. Then I worked at different jobs. 

I like tango,  sports, swimming, yoga, badminton.
I enjoy listening to different kinds of music, yet jazz is my favorite.
I like to get to know different people and different cultures. So I would be really happy to host you in my flat.

I hope to tell you more when we meet. Until then, I will leave you with curiosity :)

reviews.comments: Clean and tidy place, was as advertised and well located. My host was helpful and pointed me in the right direction for things to do.

Ceylan is very friendly, and her directions on how to get to the house were really accurate. The place is not far from Taksim at all. The apartment (especially the bathroom) was clean.
Just keep in mind that the building does not have an elevator (was not a big deal for me).

A proprietária é ótima, muito amigável. No primeiro dia ela foi me buscar na praça e já eram quase 3 da manhã. A localização também é ótima. 
Apenas a limpeza do banheiro deixou um pouco a desejar, mas no geral, foi uma boa experiência.
Ceylan is a lovely person with an apartment right in the middle of everything.  Be sure to spend time with her and learn as much as you can about Turkey and Istanbul.

Ceylan is a very friendly host, she made me feel welcome. She had the room available, even though I did only book a few days in advance, and gave detailed advice on how to get to the place (and offered to pick me up from Taksim). The flat is very nice, it looks recently decorated. The room is not big, but that is not needed anyway, as there is a large living room, and it is cozy and clean, as is the rest of the flat. The location is very good, near Taksim Square, yet in a quiet street.
I had a wonderful time staying in Istanbul.  The location of this apartment was perfect and I have nothing but nice things to say about Ceylan.  The apartment was as advertised.

Ceylan has a lovely apartment and it's perfectly located in the Taksim area. It's near the busy shopping and restaurant street and with a good walk you can get to the popular tourist spot on foot, else public transport is all around. The place is completely renovated and makes you feel at home. I totally enjoyed staying there and she is great to talk to but gives you enough privacy if you need some.
She is very accommodating on arrival times and you might meet a few other fellow travelers there. 
Totally recommend her place to stay in Istanbul.

The location of the flat is very close to Taksim Square and only 5 minutes walk to Ishtikal Street and Metro. The flat itself is fairly spacious and has all mod cons. The room is very small and has a single bed and a chest of drawers. There is no area to hang clothing. The room can also get quite humid in the evening. Ceylan herself was very open to offer advice about the city and was happy to provide for my request for a fan and easy to contact during my brief stay. All in all I would reccommend the room for very short stays who just want a crash pad and good location in Taksim.

My room was clean and neat, the flat is big, you could meet other tourists and share stories and experiences. The place was very reasonable transportation-wise for me : around 5 minutes from Taqsim metro station, around 7 minutes from Kabatas Tram station (which could take you to Sultan Ahmad and other historical places), 8 minutes from Ferry station.
Ceylan was kind and nice person.

I enjoyed staying in this apartment. The location was just PERFECT, just few minutes from the metro station/Taksim Square, it is really quit and clean.

Ceylan was very friendly.

I recommend this place.

I was very happy with my stay and can recommend this place. Nice flat, comfortable bed, very centrally located. The bedroom is small and the bed may be too short for tall people (1.80m), but it was fine for me. I only met Ceylan on the last day as she was visiting her family over the holidays, but her friend let me in and gave me lots of advice.

Ceylan's apartment is contemporary and spacious. Ceylan turned out to be a great host. She's extremely friendly and always there to advise. All the rooms were occupied and I met great people from other countries. Apartment is 5 mins to taksim and a safe neighbourhood. Taking the luggage upstairs was quite a mission-no lift.  A must recommend!
Tiny but nice room in a very central neighborhood and Ceylan was a really kind host.
Ceylan was a great host in a great location, i slept very well and didn't miss anything!
Ceylan was a fantastic host. The place is lovely and she was so helpful. Very accommodating of needs etc. I can highly recommend

I stayed in Istanbul an extra day, so I needed a room since my last Airbnb place was already booked, and Ceylan was there to make sure I had a place with short notice.
Within minutes of my first message, Ceylan confirmed my booking and made sure I had everything I needed to stay at her apartment the following day.
The location was great and the room was cozy. I only needed a bed for the night, but I had a lot more available for me if needed.
Such a friendly host and a great experience!

Ceylan was a great host! She was very easy to reach and provided a personal touch to my visit with her tips and showing me around the neighborhood. The location is amazing and just far enough from the main square to enjoy a peaceful night’s sleep. I can’t say enough good things about my stay at her apartment and I would highly recommend it!

Ceylan is a very nice host. When I arrived at the area I got lost.She went to my point to pick me up. The apartment is located at the very central place of Istanbul, near to public transport, as well as the shuttle bus collecting point to both airports. The room is clean and cozy. I recommend this apartment to short stay tourists.

Perfect accommodation, clean , calm , spacious , beautiful furnishing , etc. 
Ceylan is a perfect host. She's waiting me at the flat. She gave me all informations to find easily the accommodation... 
Thanks for all.

It was an amazing trip in Istanbul in Ceylan's house, Ceylan is sooooo kind, and the house is quite clean and comfortable. The location of the house is awesome, located near the Taksim square, which is very easy to travel in the city. I have an unforgettable trip in Istanbul.

The listing was perfect and Ceylan was a great host.  While I only stayed for about 12 hours, she made me feel at home, gave me an extra key to come and go freely and provided everything I needed.  And the location was great!  Easy 5 minute walk to the airport shuttle for my early morning flight.  If I find myself in Istanbul again, I will definitely stay again!

Ceylan was a great host! She communicated with me throughout before I arrived in Turkey and tried to make my short stay with her entertaining. Despite my unfortunate taxi experience in Istanbul, she tried to make up for it by taking me out to Taksim Square and showing me the sights! Her downtown apartment is clean and cozy, would definitely recommend staying with her during your visit!

Ceylan was a kind and friendly host, the home is located very close to the Metro and tons of restaurants and (if it's your thing) bars and clubs. The room was a bit small but beyond that I had a great stay.

I booked my nice and cozy room on a short notice and Ceylan welcomed me with open arms and a warming smile!! I had everything I needed and she made me feel very comfortable. Although we just met on a short base I can say, I would book my room at her nice place again. Thumbs up!!

I stayed three days in Ceylan flats (1 day in Shisli + 2 days in Taksim). Ceylan was so nice and she tried to contact me two days before to make sure I use the right transportation to get there. Also she helped me to make my visit plans in Istanbul (where to go and so). Both flats were clean and have beautiful decoration. Taksim flat is very close to Taksim Square, Istiklal st and the metro station (where you can come directly from the airport) 


I highly recommend everyone to stay here.

The place is well located, it took me one hour to arrive from the airport. Cyelan was so helpful she gave me maps of Istanbul, shared her coffee/tea/ cereals for breakfast. The internet is good, the place is neat and clean. The room is a bit small but do the purpose. Ceylan provided clean sheets and towels also. So really better of some the hotel where I stayed.

I've enjoyed staying at Ceylan's place. She gave a very quick respond to my request, within 2 minutes, which was especially important coz i sent a last minute request and needed an accommodation for the upcoming night. The location was very convinient, the room nice, clean and light. Ceylan is very friendly and gave me recommendations about the area and transportation.

I had a great stay at Ceylon's place. She proved to be both a warm and friendly person. The apartment is situated in a really central area around Taksim which is an excellent base to have while first in Istanbul.

I stayed one month in Ceylan flat. Location was in city centre and public transport are so close. This place is clean and have beautiful decoration. In addition Wifi connection is fast. She's warm and helpful. She made me feel very comfortable. If you want to stay in the centre of Istanbul and want live the local experience, I really recommend this place !!!

The place is close to the Taksim Square.  Really easy to access major transportation.  The room is cozy and comfortable.  The host is simply super as you can tell from more than 200 positive reviews.  I miss her and I'll definitely go bother her again next time I'm in Istanbul!
This place/host are exactly why I stay at Airbnbs. Great location, nice conversation. Highly recommended.

Ceylan was fantastic and very accommodating. Although I was set to check-in to her apartment during her work hours, she made arrangements so that I could pick up the keys at a locker very close to the apartment. I only got a chance to have a brief conversation with Ceylan but she was very welcoming and courteous. If you follow her instructions, the location is easy to find, and is about 8 minutes walk to Taksim square and Istiklal avenue.
I had a great 24 hours Istanbul experience. Thanks a lot!
Ceylan was really hospitable and very friendly. The flat is just as described - the room I was in is small but was perfect for what I needed. The location is great. I recommend it all round.

Ceylan was very friendly and welcoming. And very easy to talk to. Within 5 minutes of meeting her, we started to talk about Turkey and the current political and social situation.

The room was nice and just as described. It was right next to the bathroom but I didn't hear any noise. Her apartment was a little confusing to find but once you find it, you realize it's not that hard to get. It's in a nice quiet location yet very close to Taksim Square and Istiklal St. I was surprised how close it was. Check in and check out times were flexible, despite me landing in Istanbul very late. I really appreciated that. The room was clean and had a dresser and a coat hanger.

If I ever need a place to stay in Istanbul, I will be going back to Ceylan's place again!

Ceylan was a wonderful host, the apartment was clean and exactly as described. A nice way to see the surrounding area of Taksim, and not difficult to get into the old city, though is a bit of a walk. Highly recommend!!

Ceylan a été une hôte extrêmement agréable et accueillante. Malheureusement je ne suis restée chez elle qu'une seule nuit, mais elle m'a attendu jusque tard dans la soirée pour faire ma connaissance, me donner les clés, me faire faire le tour de l'appartement et me proposer des guides et autres cartes pour mes visites du lendemain. J’étais vraiment contente qu'elle me recommande des petits restaurants hyper typiques, que je n'avais vu dans aucun de mes guides! De plus, pour moi qui adore marcher, la location de l'appartement - a 2 minutes de Taksim - était parfaite pour visiter tout Istanbul en se baladant.
L'appartement de Ceylan ressemble exactement a ses photos: il est très beau, épuré, et lumineux. Le bonheur, ça a été de pouvoir prendre un thé et fumer une cigarette sur sa terrasse au soleil le matin. La chambre était très bien aussi, très cosy! Et très important: le lit était confortable et j'ai très très bien dormi chez Ceylan. 
La situation de l'appartement 
Comme je le disais a Ceylan, mon séjour chez elle a vraiment représenté tout ce que j'attends de AirBNB: de belles rencontres et un moyen de découvrir de nouvelles villes différemment. Je recommande chaudement l’appartement de Ceylan, qui je dois le préciser est a un prix très raisonnable par rapport a sa location et son confort.

I only started in Istanbul for one night at Celan's apartment, but she was an amazing host! I rented a car (I wouldn't recommend that), so Ceylan checked in on me later in the week too make sure my road trip was going well. She also recommended several areas in Istanbul to eat, shop, and visit.

I loved my stay in Taksim and my experience with Ceylan (note: your pronounce her name Jay-lahn... the 'c' is pronounced as a 'j' in Turkish).  She is flexible with your check-in times, as she understands people are traveling from all over the world and their flight gets in at odd hours.  She's a great communicator.  She has very precise instructions on how to get to her flat so you won't get lost!  Very easy to follow. My one piece of advice is that you pack light.  Her flat in Taksim is on the 3rd floor (in American minds that means the 4th floor, as the ground floor is ground zero). Anyway, there is no elevator and I had just been traveling from somewhere else and had a huge and heavy suitcase with me.  PACK LIGHT.  That is my big advice for everyone.

Additionally, this flat is a perfect location. It's so unbelievably close to Taksim Square, Istiklal Cadessi (big shopping street with DELICIOUS restaurants), and public transportation is a breeze.  

Go ahead and book here. No regrets!!
ceylan is an excellent host, she is very helpful, perfect place to stay in istanbul , major areas well collected.
Great spot in heart of Taksim!  Everything was very simple and easy. Would recommend this place to anyone, especially those on a quick layover.

hello
i stay 6th-9th May.
This home is very comfortable.
but top floor was difficult to move luggage.

집은 편안하고 너무 안락하고 좋았었다.
비도 왔었고 아침저녁으론 쌀쌀했는데 라디에이터 작동이 안됬는데도 불구하고 춥지는 않았다. 이불이 도톰한게 편하고 좋았다.
Ceylan was very accommodating and helpful. She was very nice and patient to wait for me while I was stuck in traffic from the airport. The room was cosy, would definitely stay again

Ceylan manage to leave the key for collection as i arrived in Taksim early. She is really helpful and arrange my smooth arrival! The location is perfect, close to Taksim and accessible to Metro. Though i didnt see much of Ceylan which is a pity (because of my busy schedule) she is really lovely and really help me with my question. Highly recommended. My first airbnb is awesome.

Ceylan is very friendly and helpful.  The room and apartment are clean and as described.  It was good to have plenty of power points and a set of drawers to store items. I enjoyed my stay.  Istanbul is an inspirational amazing place.
Ceylon was very helpful with providing directions and recommendations for thing to see and do.  The listing was exactly as described.
Unfortunately we didn't met us, but the conversation was great and fast. Flat was like in the pictures. I can recommend it.

It's very enjoyable to stay at Ceylan's place. She's been really helpful and responsible. Her place is very close to taksim square. About 15 mins walk to shuttle bus to airport. Only one thing, Ceylan's place is on top floor of the building and without elevator. If anyone has a large luggage, please make sure it's easy to lift it.
Ceylan is such lovely sweet host who makes you feel really comfortable straight away! Staying there felt like home and I think this was perfect for my first time in istanbul :)

Ceylan is a friedly, polite and very helpful person! Despite short term booking, she gave me an excellent description of how to find her appartment and helped me with information on public transport for the next days. The appartment is a very nice place in the city center just like the pictures suggest! I can absolutely recommend staying there.

Ceylan is so helpful and kind. I had a great time during my stay in her place. It's a pity that we couldn't spend more time together because my tight schedule. Anyway, hope we can meet again in the future. And sorry for the broken lamp. Have a great life, Ceylan!
I didn't get a chance to stay in Ceylan's apartment, but I met with her and she was kind and courteous. She showed me the apartment. Thank you for taking the time to meet with me.
It was a really nice property! Clean and very conveniently located in the centre of the city, but still nice and quiet at night. Ceylan was a nice owner, very welcoming and helpful.
Super nice! Very good location and easy to find!

The apartment has a fantastic location, you are really close to everything from there.
Celyan was a great host and super flexible to cover my needs as a traveler.  would definitely stay again with her when I come back to Istambul
Cozy house with great location. Ceylan is nice and easy-going. Recommend

Ceylan was very accommodating with my arrival time. I love food and she was very helpful in suggesting some local foods to try. Her home was very comfortable and within easy access to everything. If I'm ever in Istanbul again, I'll be sure to book again.
Excellent place to stay, with a great host.

Ceylan was a wonderful host--her apartment is in a building with a lot of character, close to Taksim square, but far enough away that it's a quiet and peaceful street. I had a little trouble finding the exact building, but Ceylan came down and met me on the street. She provided a comfortable and clean space with everything I needed. The only minor downfall is that sometimes other guests staying at the apartment might not be respectful of other traveler's schedules--not at all a fault of Ceylan's, just something to be aware of if you have a 6 a.m. bus to catch! Overall highly recommended and would stay again :) thank you Ceylan!

Ceylan is a lovely host. She waited for me outside and aided me in finding her place after I was lost. She showed me around and made me feel very welcomed. Thanks for everything! Shame I had such a short stay. Till next time :)

I had a great time staying at Ceylan's. She was so friendly and helpful with everything and made me feel completely welcome and at home there. The apartment looks just like the pictures and is in a great location. I loved staying there and if I return to Istanbul I would definitely go back. I highly recommend her place!!

Ceylan was very helpful in getting me the specific directions I needed. The apartment is a great location, right off of Taksim square (the walk from the Havantas shuttle wasn't bad, but difficult in the heat with my bags and stairs...). Quiet neighborhood off the main busy streets, and not close to a mosque for the calls to prayer. Really cute street with horsedrawn carriage vegetable cart!
The apartment is beautiful, shared space is great, fast wifi (mostly in the living room, not as good in the bedroom with the door shut). The kitchen was great for cooking things and she has a easy to use washer always a must for travelers!
The room was fine, bed was comfy, albeit quite hot. The airconditioner is in the living room, so to keep the room cool when I slept, I needed my door wide open. In the summer months, the a/c is a must.
Ceylan didn't stay in the apartment while I was there, there were other airbnb guests in the other rooms. But they were nice.

I had a nice time staying at Ceylan's flat. It's conveniently located just off of Taksim square. Ceylan was a friendly and helpful host and she also keeps lots of useful information about Istanbul inside the apartment. She responded promptly to my messages whenever I had a question. There were more guests staying in the other rooms than I expected, which was not a problem except that it could take awhile to wait for access to the shower/bathroom sometimes. I would recommend this room to solo travelers looking for an affordable, convenient place to stay in Istanbul.

It's perfect for those who r traveling on their own!Its an apartment with clean rooms and quiet neighborhood.Instructions given by Ceylan is very clear so I managed to find the place without additional assistance.Thank u Ceylan!I will definitely consider staying there if I visit Istanbul again.

The apartment is clean, and very well located close to Taksim Square, metro, and tramway access.  

WiFi works well.

Ceylan is very helpful about local restaurants, attractions, etc.  I loved both the kebab restaurant she recommended, and the Turkish bath she pointed me to.  Thank you Ceylan, for all your local knowledge!

Ceylan is very friendly, and met me at the apartment on my arrival as planned, and made everything easy for me.  

The only air conditioning is in the living room, so travelers should be aware that it may be hot in the evenings in their bedrooms.  Otherwise, the apartment itself is fantastic.  

Ceylan herself did not stay at the apartment.  Instead, the other rooms also had foreign travelers.  It worked out well for me as some of the other travelers and I ended up doing some things together.  

Ceylan is inconsistent in responding to messages.  Sometimes she responds within seconds via text; other times, prior to my arrival, as I was trying to work out details of arrival, I went an entire week and several messages before she got back to me.  That is the only issue I had with Ceylan.

I would recommend this listing to others, and stay here again if I go back to Istanbul!

Ceylan was very accommodating with my ever-changing travel plans. I even canceled on her once, then changed my mind and she was very flexible with it. The apartment is (as you may have seen in the comments already) just as depicted, and it beat by far staying in the airport. This was my first Airbnb experience and I am quite pleased with it.

The location is very good, close to the metro, cafes and nightlife. The room is very small but cozy. There is a convenience store right next to the building which is very useful. I may be wrong but i couldn't find AC in the room, although there is AC in the unit. The bathroom has the essentials but the apartment itself feels like a step up from a hostel so it can be a little dirty. Overall if luxury isn't what you're after the location and price are right and the host is very helpful.

Ceylan's place is just 5 mins away from Taksim square with a uphill walk. She stayed late to welcome me and we had a very nice chat. Although my stay was just one night, the cozy flat felt like home and I enjoyed every bit of my stay.

I think the location is great! It's a bustling area day and night with plenty of bars, coffee shops, and restaurants in walking distance 5-10 min. Ceylan is a perfect host! She is helpful, hospitable, and very intelligent and help me to understand the culture better as well as other tourist cities in Turkey.
Nice place in a safe area, 3min from the city center. Ceylan is a very welcoming host.

My stay at Ceylan's place was a great experience. Apartment is located near the metro Taksim and is easily found if you follow the directions given by owner. If you are traveling with a big suitcase be prepared for a little step exercise, is on the top floor. 
Apt is nice, clean and cozy, building itself is located in a pretty quiet neighbourhood. Comfortable kitchen and nice bathroom. 4 days out of my 6 days trip were amazingly hot and humid so having air conditioner in the main/dining room was a really really nice. 
I have followed few advices / directions given by Ceylan and it was really helpful. 
She is neat, punctual and great at communication

This is one of the few airbnb's I have stayed at where the images accurately show the space. Ceylan' apartment is clean and spacious. The price is excellent considering the central location in the city. Ceylan herself is on a whole other level as a host, she is kind, incredibly helpful and great fun. I can't think of a single thing to fault about this listing.

The flat has a great location, close to Taksim square and all need is just a few steps away. Unfortunately I didn't meet Ceylan in person, but she was always accessible by phone. Cost/performance ratio was really good, I just can recommend this place if you want to explore Istanbul!

It was very easy staying with Ceylan. The apartment is well located (close to Taksim), clean, and has all necessary amenities. Ceylan is helpful when it comes to getting around the city, recommendations for places to go, etc. Would definitely stay here again.

Ceylan is a great host and her flat is awsome. It's at superb location, equipped with everything you need and feels like a second home you can relax in after an adventurous day in Istanbul. Since the flat has multiple rooms, you'll have the chance to meet other travellers from around the world! I highly recommend staying at Ceylan's place!

I had a great experience at Ceylan's apartment. She was very communicative prior to my arrival and provided detailed instructions on how to get there. I arrived late and she waited up for me. 
Her apartment was tidy and a short walk Taksim Square. 
Thank you, Ceylan!

Ceylan is definitely a great host and genuine friend. Her apartment is clean and tidy, quite close to Taksim. She helped me when there was a problem with the window and conversation with her is delightful as well!

Le logement était vraiment fidèle au photos, très joli et bien entretenu. Les espaces sont grand et clair et très propre. 
Ceylan, à été très accueillante et à même pris contact avec le taxi pour lui indiquer l'adresse. Des cartes de la ville étaient à disposition pour consultation. 
Je recommande vivement l'adresse de Ceylan ! Super expérience :)

That was my first experience with airbnb and It was perfect with Ceylan place. Ceylan is the perfect host I ever meet , the location was great apartment is clean quite and near to public transportation . you can find any thing you need all equipment available to use . I would like to stay a gain here if I came to Istanbul in future . I recommend Ceylan house to stay at Istanbul  :)

Ceylan is a perfect host. Communication with her was really good, she was flexible in the timing of the check-in, gave me very good istructions how to get to her place and also very good recommendations what is worth seeing in Istanbul. She was very welcoming and friendly. The flat was close to Taksim and to other Metro stations, although really central it was not to loud, and it looked exactly as on the pictures and everything could be found as described. The one bed room was quite small, but I knew that in advance and as I was almost only there for sleeping, it did not bother me too much. I stayed for one week but Ceylan did not stay in the flat overnight very often. In some nights I shared the flat with other guests in the other room, some of them I hardly met, with others I had nice talks. Most nights I was just on my own. If you do not expect a super, super luxury 4-star hotel and are not afraid of sharing a flat with other tourists, than I can recommend for you to stay here. It is a good place to be!
这是一次不错的住宿体验,房子离塔克西姆广场和独立大街都很近,交通方便｡因为晚上的航班,到达时已是凌晨一点多,房东不但一直等我,在身体不适的情况下还帮我抬行李,非常感谢!

Ceylan is a very thoughtful and considerate host. Her place is very close to Taksim Square and a 10min walk to the water. Safe. Clean. Comfortable. Will stay here again the next time I visit Istanbul. Wonderful city.

Ceylan was a great host. She was very interactive with her guests. The location is fantastic right near Istiklal Street and very near the Taksim metro. The location is not good for those who may have mobility problems as it is down a steep road, and then up a steep road again to get to the apartment. But if you have no issues with that, then this is fine. The room was small but good enough for a solo traveler like I was.

Ceylan is a great host! She is very welcoming, friendly and lovely to chat with. The apartment is in a great location and very clean. I highly recommend anyone to stay here. I will if I return to Istanbul. 
Thank you Ceylan!

Ceylan was really sweet and welcoming. I was only in Istanbul overnight, but having an enthusiastic host and comfortable room in the center of town made it possible to see much more of the city than I expected to. Ceylan actively got in touch and sent maps and photos to make it easy to find her apartment, and made herself available to help me and her other guests get in. She greeted me with tea and friendly conversation, gave me helpful advice for my short time in town, and generally made me feel at home even for such a short stay. Ceylan is a brilliant host, and I highly recommend her listing.

Very clean apartment within a walking distance from Taksim Square.. Unbeatable location !!!
Highly recommend to anyone visiting Istanbul !
Was amazing. Thank you so much.

Everything was just perfect. Next time for sure again:-)
Thank you so much Ceylan!
Best Regards Vedat

To Stay with Ceylan was defintily the best idea! The flat is compact, easy and gives you everything you need. And Ceylan is just the perfect host, she told me about everything I wanted to know and even took us to many places like local Restaurants, whenever she had some free time. 
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Thank you Ceylan!

Ceylan it's a good host....   the neborhood it's on a central touristique place. ..  and close To the bosforus and the big Street market. ....   you can find every thing's you need...   it's was perfect......    :)

Ceylan's home in Taksim is a great location and accessible easily via Metro. Istiklal street nearby is a great area with lot of restaurants and cafes. Ceylan is a great host and helped a great deal with going around in Istanbul. Would definitely recommend staying here!

My stay with Ceylan was great! 

Ceylan made me feel welcomed by meeting me at the apartment and then showing me everything I needed to know. Communication was excellent and she helped me figure out which bus to take from the airport. I really liked staying here because I felt at home - Ceylan even invited me to have dinner on Christmas, so it was nice to cook and share a meal at home.

The neighborhood is excellent - in a minute you are in Taksim Square with lots of coffeeshops and restaurants. There is a main road nearby with retail shopping, and nightlife is close by as well. There are also small markets close by for convenience or food items, with a bigger market a short walk away.

The listing is accurate. The apartment is heated with individual controls in each room so it's always nice and warm, and everything is orderly and cleanly. At night it is quiet for a peaceful sleep.

Thanks again Ceylan!

Ceylan is probably the sweetest person in all of Turkey. She was very nice, smart, helpful both with personal things as well as finding things to do and surviving the city. Her place has multiple rooms and the entire time I was there multiple people came and went so was able to meet others the original AirBNB way. Highly recommend her place while in Istanbul
Due to change in plans, Ceylan allowed me to extend my stay another night. She is always nice, welcoming and helpful.
Ceylan was great!

The place was very central, only 5 min walking distance from mail road with shops off Taksim square. Nice flat, cozy room. The flat was neat and had all the essentials, coffee and tea, soap - towel was provided. Very friendly environment, would visit again!
Ceylan was a great host, very kind and helpful. She gave me some tips and advices about the city and she has many guides and maps of Istanbul wich helps a lot. I hope I can return soon.

Secluded in a tranquil, residential quarter a short walk from Taksim Square, the apartment fits description -- itself being clean and simply but tastefully decorated.

While I didn't get to spend much time with Ceylan, she was helpful, polite and responsive both on (Hidden by Airbnb) and in person. 

All in all,  it's a nice place worth recommending to friends.

Ceylan is a very nice person and the Apartment is in one of the best local in Istanbul, near to the subway, bus and the Bus direct to both airport. 5 Minutes you are the favorite walking street full with Restaurants, teahouse, bars, shops...... highly suggest you to book her room !
Ceylan is a warm and welcoming host, very friendly and helpful. The room was cozy and perfect for a lone traveller like myself. It was a great experience!

I feel like there's not enough positive things I can say about my stay at Ceylan's apartment.

First of all, the apartment is very well located - central, but in a quiet neighborhood at the same time. The apartment is really comfortable, cozy and clean.

Also, Ceylan was a great host who made my stay really easy and helped with anything I needed. 

If you travel to Istanbul, I really recommend to stay at Ceylan's place, you will be glad you did! : )
Everything was great at Ceylan's home, plus it is a perfect location if you want to be close to Taksim area

Ceylan was a very friendly and accommodating host. She was flexible with check-in/out and happy to offer advice one what to see and do in Istanbul. The room was indeed quite cozy and was exactly what I was looking for.
Ceylan was very friendly and helpful. Took her advice on places to eat and was well rewarded :) Stay was simple and everything just as described. Happily again!

Ceylan is the perfect host easygoing and fun. The room is very clean and comfortable. You Can also take some coffee and the in the kitchen. Just two minutes walk from Taksim square! Thanks for hospitality.

I stayed 12 days in Istanbul and when I'll be coming again I will stay at Ceylan's apartment for sure. The place is clean, Ceylan is always there if needed and the apartment is located near to many shops and touristic attractions. I definitely recommend Ceylan's apartment to anyone out there looking for a place to stay in Istanbul.

Ceylan is very attentive and helpful! Made it veeeery easy to find the apartment (with pics and everything) , had loads of maps, tips and advices about where to go, what to do and what to avoid. The place is cozy and unfortunately I stayed there only 1 night, I would have stayed longer without a doubt!
Thanks Ceylan!!

Ceylan was a great host who was very flexible and generous. She adapted to my delayed flight to ensure that I got the keys to the apartment. The place is exactly as described and is very centrally located, but just far off the main streets so it is very quiet. A great place in Istanbul.

The apartment is modern and in good condition. Ceylan is nice and generous. It's a pity I was staying only two nights, so we had no chance to talk nothing more but when she welcomed me warmly.

The apartment is perfectly located for seeing the city. In one direction you get to taksim where the airport buses are stopping, in the other direction you get to the tram line which goes directly to Sultanahmet without requiring you to change lines!

---

I had a little bit trouble finding the apartment at night, but if you know where to go it is actually just a few minutes straight from taksim. The problem is that it is sometimes hard to spot the street names, so make sure to bring turn-by-turn directions starting from taksim.

Stayed there for one night. Place is nicely located just a few blocks from Taksim square and is easy to find. Flat has everything you need in it and is clean. Calm and silent at night. Ceylan is very kind, intelligent and helpful person with very positive attitude. I definitely recommend both host and the place. Thank you Ceylan!

Ceylan is an extremely warm host who is genuinely focussed on creating a great experience. Since the time of booking, I had been in touch with her and she provided detailed instructions on directions and travel to make my solo travel comfortable and predictable.
The listing details were accurate and the neighbourhood is located right close to Taksin Square and all public transportation.
Highly recommend her place as the best value for money!

Had a great time at Ceylan's flat. A great location this is incredibly easy to access from the airport and even better for exploring the sights of Istanbul. She was a great host that answered all my questions and was accessible as needed. Flat is super cozy and offers all the amenities of home. Would definitely stay again when returning.
Everything's nice..the host, the location and the apartment..would like to stay again in the future
Evde çok rahat ve temizdir. Ayrıca konumu çok uygundu. Ceylan hanımla da iletişimimiz gayet sorunsuz ilerledi, gözüm kapalı tavsiye ederim :)

The room was as described and very clean and comfortable, as well as the rest of the apartment. I did not meet Ceylon because she was out of town when I arrived, however, a friend of hers welcomed me and was wonderful in her explanations of the house as well as things to see and do in Istanbul. The location was great. About a 20 minute walk to the bus stop for the both airports. And a 10 minute walk to Taksim Square. I really enjoyed my three night stay in Ceylon's home.

Ceylan is a very nice and welcoming host, that was a real pleasure to meet her. It's apartment is in a very good location in a quiet street near to Taksim square hotel, to a lot of lively streets and to the airport shuttles. I would recommend it for every young lone traveller.
Ceylan was an awesome host. I felt welcome, and was able to communicate easily with her. She knows the city very well and won't ever shy away from accommodating her guests.
Good place. Great value. Just according to the address it was hard to find. Dark neighborhood at night.

Ceylan was a perfect host. The place was very clean and cozy. She made me feel at home and offered me some suggestions for touring the historic sites that saved me lots of money over hiring a car. She will be my first enquiry next time I go back to Istanbul!
Ceylan was very nice and warm. She made me feel welcome instantly and talked me through all of my needs for my stay. An excellent experience overall.
Un accueil très agréable de la part de Ceylan avec une chambre en parfaite état. Tout prêt de Taksim. Adresse fortement conseilléé

Ceylan is incredibly nice. I was in her apartment on the night on the coup and she warned me and checked in repeatedly  to make sure I was okay. It was kind and caring. Above and beyond the Airbnb terms of agreement :)

Her communication before tn trip was excellent. Everything was nice and clean. 

The apartment is nice and as described. Like a lot of Airbnb places it is up stairs - on the 3rd floor, so worth a thought for elderly or disabled travellers. 

It is very well located for taksim  and Istanbul which is still one of my favourite cities in the world.

I locked myself out by accident.  When the key is in the lock inside, there is no way that anyone can open the door from outside.  So the other occupant who was extremely nice by the way, was stuck because of this incident.  Everyone was very nice and understanding.  Ceylan called a locksmith to open the door and I arrived at the apartment just before the locksmith arrived and I've paid for the cost.  Ceylan is a wonderful person!  Thanks Ceylan, you have made me feel right at home.
한여름에는 에어컨을 끼고 사는 나라서 유럽의 각방에는  에어컨이 없는것에 걱정했는데 5일중 2틀은 게스트가없어서 거실에서 시원하게 잤어요~~^^ 첫째날 더워서  방에서 잠도 설쳤는데 담달 왕선풍기를~~호스트가 매일 일을해서 자주 볼수는없지만 깨끗하고 조용해서 잘 쉬었다 갈수있었어요~thsnks!
Ceylan was very nice and friendly host. Her place has a great location and that area is very quite. I highly recommend her place for a nice stay in the middle of the Istanbul.

It was once again really good to stay with Ceylan. She is an incredible host. I really liked staying there before so I came back again. She is always helpful and smiling. He flat is located in a very central place few minutes to Taksim Square. And very easy to get to old city. The flat is clean and spacious. I recommend her to everyone.

Ben 7 gün kaldım o çok güzel evdir. Taksim meydanından yürüyerek takriben 5 dakika sürüyor. Evnin önünde bir gida var, orada kolayca şeyler alabilirsiniz. 

It was so great to stay there and I met two guys from different country. It's really easy to get to Taksim square and have some fun out there
Ceylan was so nice and she let us use everything in that house. 
I used to smoke at the balcony which is the only place you can smoke. For few days trip, it's quite nice place to stay
Ceylan's place is very convenient to Taksim, and she was a helpful host. I would recommend her place to others.

Great location. So close to public transport, shopping,restaurants and all other Istanbul activities. Hotel 2 min walk away for pickup if you book a tour or airport transfer. Ceylan is an easygoing person and great to talk too. My plane was delayed and I couldnt contact her so got in late. She was up waiting and made me feel right at home. Clean apartment, comfortable bed and plenty of brochures, lonely planet guides and metro timetable to make the most of your trip.
This was a great place to stay. Ceylan is nice and helpful. It is clean, quiet and a great location. Walking distance to many shops, restaurants and nightlife. I would definitely stay here again.

Ceylan is a great and friendly host ! She helped me twice for translation, if I had any problem I could ask Ceylan and she did her best. Thanks Ceylan!
I had a nice experience in Istanbul, it was quite good to stay so close to Taksim square. Flat is nice, everything was ok! :-)
Take care and see you once for sure !

The flat is located in Taksim area which is one the most central location in Istanbul without any doubt. That also means that, you can come across any type of people around the vicinity ranging from tourists to locals as well as unfortunately the refugees that live on the street. When I first got there, as i only put the street name without the door number on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, i went through multiple streets that looked dodgy to the eye with many homeless refugees around. Do not make the same mistake i made, as i got lost in those streets and started freaking out. Put the building number as well while trying to find the flat and you will see it is located right below the main road (Gumussuyu) next to five star hotels. The proximity of the flat to the transport links dazzled me once i went out to discover the vicinity. The restaurants, bars, shops, everything is within 10 min walk tops. I stayed in the smallest room in Ceylan's flat and it was good for one night stay. However if you have a massive suitcase, i would strongly advise you to book one of the larger ones, i have seen them, quite beautifully decorated and spacious, as you may not fit your suitcase in the tiny room. Ceylan was great, literally went out of her way to get me the keys, postponing her plans to meet up with me at a place of my convenience. Strongly advise anyone to have a decent and economical stay in Istanbul, better than staying at hotels especially if you dont want to constrict yourself in a room and feel the comfort of home:))

Everything as described, Ceylan is very good, honest and helpful person .. The place is so near to Taksim square and safe, I would like to visit her again.
Thanks Ceylan for hosting.

Overall : I would not stay here again.

The good: It is a nicely decorated clean flat in a central location. Ceylan is a nice person.

The bad: The mattress was very uncomfortable. You can easily feel the metal frame and the springs even when you touch it with your hands. Imagine sleeping on it. Actually I preferred sleeping on the floor with my camping mat and it was better. Ceylan is not living in this house nor did she stopped by or checked/messaged if everything was ok. During my 3 day stay she only communicated me on the checkout day and asked me what time I was leaving. 

The ugly: There were 2 other guys in the house which both were noisy and very unfriendly towards me. Ceylan told me about them but did not introduced us. Since they would not talk to me I do not know their history but It looked like nobody took their consent about airbnb and they were not happy about it. So beware, if you stay here you might get stuck with 2 guys who barely tolerates you

Ceylan's apartment is in the heart of the new district. It's conveniently in between Findikli and Taksim square, so there's easy access to the metro and the tram. This works better than being closer to Taksim where you can only get the metro, which doesn't go directly to the old town. Using the tram you can get to Sultanahmet in 15 minutes. The apartment is also a brief walk from lively Istiklal street and all the food of Asmali Mescit. There is excellent nightlife in those areas.
While I was there, I used one room and the other two rooms also had visitors. So the atmosphere in the apartment was very much like a small hostel. There is ample space in the living room for people to hang out. There's a small kitchen but I stayed for only a few days so didn't get to use it. The bathroom is shared between everyone. One thing to note in that it's an old building so there are no elevators and the apartment is on the third floor.

Ceylan is a perfect host. After booking she contact me very fast, gave me a good description of how to get to her flat. During my stay she arranged everything to make it comfortable. My full recommendation!

It was a perfect stay! Ceylan was always very helpful and kind. We had nice chats about different things and had dinner together. She is very friendly and talkative. The place is very central and close to places. It is a very clean flat. Hope to come here again.
Clean place . Approachable location
The host was awake when I came at 3am in the morning.

Overall experience was great. The location adds the best feel. 4 to 5 minutes walk to Taksim square and Istiklal street.The host was extremely nice. She was courteous enough to arrange for my check-in 8 hours before the scheduled check-in time (which was 6pm), as my flight landed in the morning (9am). She spoke with the taxi driver to let him know of the directions. She came in to contact via (Hidden by Airbnb) to understand my travel plan and was kind enough to propose if I would like to check-in early so can pay a visit at the work place and collect the keys which I did. Unfortunately we couldnt meet after that due to mismatch of schedule but we exchanged a courteous note.
Ceylan is an very nice lady,roommates are also very kind.This place is very cozy and quite.Actually it's my first time living in an Airbnb place,it's an interesting Journey
Ceylan and his roommates where very lovely hosts!:) nice cozy room very close to taksim square! Everything is very reachable!:) just can recomment theirs home and definetly gonna come back!:)

Ceylan is a very sweet and accurate person. The room is very confortable! I lived in this zone of the city, i can say Ceylan's house is an excellent location! This was for me a perfect experience. I really recommend Ceylan house to everybody!

Loved staying at Ceylan's place. She's a great host - gave clear directions to her place, helped check in, told me about the neighborhood. Her place is clean, cosy and comfortable, close to all the nightlife, bars, restaurants in Istiklal / Cihangir.

Ottima esperienza. The owner was very respectful and made sure that we were happy with all the arrangements. I had a very good time and thus I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone wishing a nice place in a beautiful city.

It was great ! I stayed at this place for 4 nights , the apartment location is very strategic , only few steps from  taksim , the house is very clean and cozy , it was totally like home to me , ceylan created this amazing atmosphere , she answerd all  my questions and she were always there when I needed her, I would defiantly stay here again 

Thank you ceylan

nice and cosy place. apartment is fully furnitured with all required equipment. I will definitely recommend this place. 
But if you have heavy luggage consider that you are going to up some hills
oldukça makul merkezi bir yer taksim meydanı metro istasyonuna yürüyüş mesafesinde, ev sahibi çok iyi fiyatına göre iyi ve de sessiz.

Had a great time staying at Ceylan's. I had a late flight arrival and didn't get to her apartment until 1:30am. She was patient and it was really nice of her to wait up for me. The room, apartment and location were all great! Highly recommended!

I would highly recommend her apartment if anyone is visiting istanbul, the location was just perfect its in the center and everything is in walking distance. The apartment looks exactly the same as in the pictures. She is very friendly and helpful. She is literally an amazing and a super host :).

Ceylan's spare room is a good fit for a solo traveler who wants to be out and about. The room is small but tidy and equipped with a comfy bed. It's up three floors so you want to be a light traveler. The house was clean when I arrived and Ceylan was very helpful about everything and was a clear communicator. Because she works, the check in is late afternoon but there are so many lovely cafes and places to walk about, so I didn't mind at all. Ceylan is also respectful of space and has lots of good tips on things to do Ist. Worth it to stay here.

I had a great stay at Ceylan's apartment, really well located and equipped with everything you need to feel like home. Ceylan is also very helpful and accomodating; would definitely recommend to fellow visitors to Istambul

I liked this place! It's really close to the Taksim square from where you can travel to the airport on a comfortable bus, close to the center. If you like walking, you can go to the Sultanahmet without using public transport, as I did. But the bus / metro stops are also close to the apartment. The neighborhood is quiet, the room is small but cozy and had everything I needed. And Ceylan is very friendly host, I liked talking to her, though it was only 1 night.  Nice place to stay!

Ceylan's place was in the best location in Istanbul. It was close to all of the best shops and restaurants. I was traveling solo as a woman in Istanbul and Ceylan made me feel so comfortable and welcome. I hope to return someday!

Ceylan is a very friendly host, she will provide you a clean and well organized flat, which you can walk in 3 minutes to taksim metro. You can also find all sorts of cafes and restaurants in 1 km diamater. I strongly recommend you guys to give it a go!

Wonderful stay. Ceylan is a very kind and accommodating host. The apartment was clean, secure and with good access. I'd stay again!

Ceylan is an exceptional person and host. The location is central, accessible and safe and Ceylan is generous and knows everything you need to know to discover and have a great trip. I hope to be back.
Great location,  great hostess

After staying at Ceylan's house, I understand what does super host mean. 

Basically, the house will give you the impression of being a Turkish resident.

It is quite, have a grocery store in front of it, on a hill and will get you to tram, metro or bus if you want.

Istiklal street where all the fun and activities goes is 6-7 min Max by foot.

And Ceylan is so kind to give you any tips or information you need so quickly by asking her on (Hidden by Airbnb) .

She will give the exact direction by sending some photos to your phone.

Finally, there is more than one room that the apartment has and during my stay I met couple of amazing people to explore Istanbul. You might have this case if it is high season.

The house is very recommended for light traveler whom want use then place only for crash.

FYI, the letter C is pronounced more of J. Hence, the host name is Jeylan.

Ceylan was a great host! She was helpful with directions from the airport and game me a great suggestion for an awesome bus that was 1/10 the cost of the taxi and took the same amount of time.  
   She greated me upon my arrival, which was pretty late by the way and even let me come out to meet her friends as it was my only night in Istanbul and I didn't know anyone.  
   The only minor drawback of the whole experience was the lack of AC in my room as it gets really hot in Istanbul in mid summer.  However the living room has an AC and I was provided a fan.  
   Would absolutely recommend for younger people or anyone with a youthful spirit.

The apartment is clean, comfortable, and very conveniently located (just off Taksim Square). I don't have any complaints. Ceylan was a great host: very friendly and responsive. I would happily stay again.

Ceylan's place was exactly as advertised and she provided clear instructions on how the get to the apartment from the airport and was there to greet me.

I came to know Ceylan as being very friendly and committed  and her room was just perfect for me - centrally located, access to public transportation and comfortable. Definitely recommended.

He puesto 4 estrellas porque Ceylán fue muy amable y atenta, pero hubieron algunos pequeños detalles que no me gustaron:

Al baño le hacía falta una limpieza más profunda, tal vez porque habían otras huéspedes que lo utilizaban también y pues no siempre estaba tan limpio, pero dentro de lo normal estaba bien. 

En mi habitación el bote de basura estaba lleno de basura de huéspedes anteriores que no lo habían retirado previamente. En el piso habían pelos y un poco empolvado. Sábanas, cama, velador y todo lo demás si estaba limpio. 

La ubicación estaba bien, a unos 10 minutos en TRAM del centro, pero era una colina, así que mucha atención aquellos que no tengan buena condición física, pues terminarán exhaustos de la subida al inmueble y después los 4 pisos qué hay que subir para llegar al departamento. El TRAM queda a 7 minutos y metro a 5 minutos. 

Cosas buenas:

Ceylán da un excelente trato
Coordina tu llegada muy bien
Se asegura que no te falte nada 
Llegué súper tarde, más de las 2am y se las arregló para mandar a alguien a recibirme.

Nice flat in an excellent location — just 2-3 minutes by foot to Taksim Square, sheltered away in a quiet and peaceful part of the neighbourhood. Close to Cihangir and all major attractions in Beyoglu. Decent amenities and cozy rooms that best suit solo travellers who are travelling light. It’s a fantastic place if you’d like to socialize with other travellers! The only downside is that sounds travel quite easily in the apartment — generally, it wasn’t an issue for me. The best thing about this place is Ceylan, whose hospitality and lightning quick responses were a source of comfort. (As an example: when the bathroom light went out in the evening, it took no more than 10-15 minutes for her to have someone come and fix it.) I’d happily recommend her place to others.

Ceylan est super, très avenante et arrangeante :)
Je la recommande pour son sens de l'hospitalité et de l'attention qu'elle vous porte !
Excellent place to stay, very close to principal walking boulevard. Very clean and confortable. Ceylan was very communicative during all my stay and gave me recommendations and good tips.

This place is a gem in Taksim Square. Basically, very accessible to all things you will do in Istanbul. If you are able to get reservation in this place you’re lucky! Amazing place. Very close to Taksim Square and all attractions. house had everything you need. Ceylan is very helpful. I will stay here again.

Perfect stay at Ceylan's place. Great location, nice apartment and fast responses from the host.

Ceylan’s place is a great fit for a solo-traveller. Great location and everything that you need to charge your battery for the next day. great host, always avaliable for help.
location is great. house very.

Ceylan is always nice and helpful.
The location of this Airbnb is brilliant. Ceylon was a great host. she was helpful and very quick to respond. The only thing I want to note is it may not be the best place if you have bad knees.

Ceylan was a great host. If you speak english you won’t have a problem communicating with her. Rooms were very clean and the location (close to taksim square) was great too. I definitely enjoyed my stay with Ceylan.

Great location,  5 minutes walk to Taksim square/ or Metro, close to many famous tourist attractions. The room is clean and quite for sleeping. Ceylan is very friendly, open-minded and thoughtful. Ceylan was a great host, very helpful with local tips and easy to contact for any questions. The location of the house is excellent proximity to the Taksim square with lots of restaurants and bars.

Ceylan was a fantastic host and a very nice person! She was really helpful both before and during my stay and gave a lot of good tourist advice. The apartment was nice and not far from transport links and the renowned Istiklal Street which has lots of shops and restaurants.

The location is very good,you can enjoy yourself around Taksim square,or you can go to T1 station by walk in 5 mins.The host is so nice,she show me the map and give me useful information.Wonderful experience in Istanbul,it’s recommended!

Ceylans place is incredibly nice and at the center of the city. very easy access to everywhere. and she is always very helpful with everything we need and gives good advices. I will surely be back again.

Ceylan was a fantastic and accommodating host. She went well out of her way to work around my schedule, and had excellent advice for both the local area and Istanbul as a whole. In addition, she is great to talk to and a multilingual expert.

As for the place, it was all I had hoped for and more. The flat was very clean and well looked after, and the furnishing is very tasteful. I felt very cosy and safe during my stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again in the future.

Logement vétuste !
