The host was nice and welcoming, but when asked to adjust a day she wouldn't consider it at all, so I paid an extra day, but that is my mistake, I guess it is fine. I did not feel that comfortable staying at this place. There were odors in the kitchen and living room. Utensils and plates were greasy and almost unable to be washed, so I did not use them because they were disgusting. Taking a shower was what I hated the most at this place because I wouldn't fit in the shower as the ceiling was too low. I had to squat at all times while showering and when I would step out of the shower, I literally felt like stepping in a big puddle. We used towels to drain the water everyday for every shower; it was a real struggle. We cleaned the apt before leaving and left it almost cleaner than we found it.

name: Oceanview condo w/ a shared pool, hot tub, & tennis - nearby beach access
space: Stay directly across from the ocean at this beautiful condo in the heart of Kona. With a view of the water and the famous Kona sunsets from your lanai, you'll be able to enjoy every evening relaxing in this family-friendly Kona escape. With access to a shared pool, hot tub, and tennis court, this rental will be the perfect place to call home while you're away on the Big Island.  What's nearby: Across the street is Magic Sands Beach Park where you can boogie board or watch some surfing when the swell is in. For snorkeling, less than a mile away is some excellent snorkeling at Kahaluu Beach. If you want to get out on the water yourself, head a few miles north on Ali'i drive to the pier where you can get a paddleboard or kayak. If you want to charter a boat, head a few miles the other way to meet up with Fair Wind Cruises for some snorkeling adventures. And don't miss the Kona Brewing Co. less than five miles away. There, you can tour the brewery, have lunch or dinner in their outdoor gar

host.host_about:
Greetings from Team Vacasa Vacation Rentals of Hawaii, LLC! Yes, we're a professional property management company—but we're also real people, trusted by the owners of vacation homes to take care of all the heavy lifting like housekeeping, reservations, maintenance, and guest care. (Because, to be honest, renting out a vacation home really can be a full-time job!)


We have local teams on the ground to take care of our homes and our guests. We like to think of it as the best of both worlds: you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind vacation experience in a unique property, only without compromising on service and convenience. You can trust that your home will be cleaned by professional housekeepers, and your calls will be answered (right away, around the clock!) by our dedicated Guest Services team. 


Check out our listings, and if you have any questions, get in touch! We'd love to help you plan your perfect getaway.

reviews.comments: We had a lovely time at the condo. We found it surprisingly quite even with shared walls. It is in a great location and  is well stocked with beach toys and tips for places to go! The host was easy to contact and even made special arrangements when a previous guest delayed our reservation. Would definitely book again.

name: Luxury living in a newly build House.
summary: Luxury Private rooms in a newly build house. Close to M7 & M5. 40 m drive from Sydney Airport. 5 min from Leppington Train station. This House is spacious and has 5 private bedrooms with 5 Bathrooms, Two as an Air BnB room, one is my bedroom, 2nd for Kids and the 3rd as my office. There is plenty of space for 4 people to live comfortably. The bedrooms is large enough to sleep 4 people with Private bathrooms. It's centrally Air conditioner & Heating.
space: Lovely rooms in Denham Court. The bedrooms are private and has double beds with a large window, and plenty of cupboard space. it's a large modern and clean private bathrooms.  There's a great front yard to sit on in the morning sun with your tea or coffee which is provided.  There are 2 living spaces one with a large flat screen television, a new kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and microwave.  There's a washing machine available as well as the wifi if requested.
description: Luxury Private rooms in a newly build house. Close to M7 & M5. 40 m drive from Sydney Airport. 5 min from Leppington Train station. There is plenty of space for 4 people to live comfortably. The bedrooms is large enough to sleep 4 people with Private bathrooms. It's centrally Air conditioner & Heating. Lovely rooms in Denham Court. The bedrooms are private and has double beds with a large window, and plenty of cupboard space. it's a large modern and clean private bathrooms.  There's a great front yard to sit on in the morning sun with your tea or coffee which is provided.  There are 2 living spaces one with a large flat screen television, a new kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and microwave.  There's a washing machine available as well as the wifi if requested. I work for myself so that keeps me busy, I also go out often and I'm away
neighborhood_overview: Cloes super market is around the corner with some good cafe and Thai food. You will find many lookout in the south west. Great place to live if you are heading South (Canberra or Melbourne)
transit: Denham Court is very close to M7 & M5 (8 km). 40 m drive from Sydney Airport. 5 min from Leppington Train station.
interaction: I work for myself so that keeps me busy, I also go out often and I'm away sometimes too, however when i'm home I always enjoy a chat and a coffee or glass of wine and some advice on where to go, when and how to get there. It's always nice to share a meal sometimes, but respectfully giving you your space too. I really enjoy having people from all over the world come and stay with me.
house_rules: - No shoes in House - 10 pm to 7 am Quite Hours - No alcohol in House

reviews.comments: This family was wonderful. They shared there beautiful home with us. Had great amenities and very accommodating. Excellent response time.  Thanks Karan and family!
Karan and his family are the best host I have encountered so far with AirBNB. Felt like family away from home. I will highly recommend his place to every one.

name: Big apartment by Barcelona's main train station
summary: By Barcelona's main Train Station (Sants Estació), super well comunicated with public transport (to the airport and to everywhere in the city), you can find this 100sq. mt. apartment that can fit up to 7 people in 3 double bedrooms + 1 single bedroom. It also has a very spacious livingroom, 3 bathrooms and a big kitchen. The apartment has been partly renovated with wooden floors, air conditioning and heating in the living room, brand new beds and matresses and furniture.
description: By Barcelona's main Train Station (Sants Estació), super well comunicated with public transport (to the airport and to everywhere in the city), you can find this 100sq. mt. apartment that can fit up to 7 people in 3 double bedrooms + 1 single bedroom. It also has a very spacious livingroom, 3 bathrooms and a big kitchen. The apartment has been partly renovated with wooden floors, air conditioning and heating in the living room, brand new beds and matresses and furniture. As the apartment is located 1 min away from Barcelona's main Train Station, it's very easy to get everywhere in the city super easy. As well as the travels to and from the airport, the train is direct to the airport every 30 minutes (check the schedule for special timings).
transit: As the apartment is located 1 min away from Barcelona's main Train Station, it's very easy to get everywhere in the city super easy. As well as the travels to and from the airport, the train is direct to the airport every 30 minutes (check the schedule for special timings).
house_rules: - No extra guests allowed overnight. - No parties or loud noises allowed. - No loud noises before 9AM or after 10PM - Respect the neighbors. - Please take care of the apartment as it was your home.

name: 红磡五星级酒店式公寓海景房豪华装修海韵轩海湾轩 理工大嘉里酒店边维港夜景 尖沙咀海港城庙街旺角西九龙
summary: 坐拥270度壮丽维港盛景,让您天天海边漫步,夜夜观赏维港夜景,交通便利,临近港铁尖沙咀,红磡,黄埔,及尖东站,海底隧道及码头,坐拥交通枢纽之利,穿梭各区方便快捷｡超高层超五星酒店公寓,豪华装修,在屋内可看着维港夜景入睡,旁边就是著名的网红酒店嘉里酒店,下楼就可在海边散步,锻炼身体,看维多利亚夜景,走到星光大道,五星级厨房,锅碗瓢盆一应俱全,楼下24小时保安,24小时前台服务,24小时惠康超市,24小时咖啡厅小便利超市,楼下又有的士停靠站,24小时有的士在此等人,楼下还有公交车站,有直达铜锣湾 旺角 庙街 西九龙 太平山 中环等热门地方的公交车｡楼下还有直达海港城,尖沙咀,红磡地铁,尖沙咀地铁,尖东地铁,的免费酒店巴士来回,15分钟一班,刷房卡即可上车｡旁边大楼都是豪华小区,有香港著名的豪宅半岛豪庭,海滨南岸,海名轩｡还有理工大学生公寓,楼下马路宽敞,行走的人群,有大学生,高级白领,名流富商,贵妇名媛,素质高｡走300米就到黄浦区,满街都是著名小吃｡好几个菜市场,好几家超市,好几家银行｡经常能在这里遇到tvb明星｡紧贴九龙红磡湾畔,尽情享受醉人的东方之珠临海景致｡
space: 周边有网红酒店嘉里酒店,有香港著名豪宅半岛豪庭｡有理工大宿舍｡所以出入的都是大学生,名流富商 贵妇 高级白领｡ 楼下有24小时的士等候,24小时惠康超市,24小时前台保安,24小时咖啡厅｡24小时海边路灯

house_rules: 弄丢房卡很麻烦,需扣押金600港币,请不要弄丢

reviews.comments: 整个公寓环境非常好,交通便利,出门就是公车站､的士站､地铁也只需要5分钟｡住处真的是海景房,再往下看可以看到公寓的泳池｡我们住在海韵轩,在没有到达前,房东热情的为我们搜索周边的美食,还准备小吃和饮料,我们到红磡车站后小莲专程来地铁站接我们,帮我提行李｡很赞的一次旅行｡
房东是个很好沟通和交流的年轻姑娘,房间位置也很好,环境不错,用餐,看维港夜景非常方便｡干净整洁,适合一家三口,尤其是六七岁以上的孩子出门｡
在我们还没到香港的时候房东小姐姐就提前联系了我,告诉我怎么才能到达住所｡到了住所后房东小姐姐很热情的当了个小导游告诉我们周围的吃的,公交路线｡很热情,很友好,房间也很不错 3个人就刚刚好｡ 下次再来香港还会住这里｡
非常好

host.host_about: We are Sweet Inn and we offer a unique hospitality experience. We have over 500 stylish apartments for vacations and business trips in 10 incredible European cities. We’ve hosted thousands of guests since 2014 - so rest assured, you won’t have any unpleasant surprises. Spoiler Alert: Our apartments are professionally designed for the ultimate comfort - heavenly beds, the fluffiest towels, toiletries by Nuxe, a Nespresso machine, super-fast WiFi and tons of other perks; trust me, you’ll notice the difference. Two more things you should know about Sweet Inn: We have a City Lobby and a local team in every city that will take the best care of you; we’ll even personally meet you at the apartment to show you in. And we’ll help you make the most out of your stay in Barcelona with tips only a local would know. We also offer incredible services to upgrade your stay - airport transfer, housekeeping, full fridge, private chef and many more. One last thing, download our App after booking, it’s really great; it will make your experience so much smoother.

name: 走路3分钟过关香港罗湖口岸100米两房一厅楼下双地铁口
summary: 房子交通特别便利,就在罗湖口岸隔壁,步行5分钟,就可以到罗湖口岸过关到香港｡离罗湖口岸有多近呢,就是从住处步行150米到罗湖地铁站E2出口,进入罗湖地铁站,罗湖地铁站A出口出来,就是过关大厅了｡就这么近关口!! 楼下有双地铁口,距离住处20米就是人民南站D出口｡步行150米就是罗湖地铁站E2出口｡如果你来旅行,到深圳湾公园､红树林公园可人民南地铁站直接到达｡世界之窗､欢乐谷､kkmall和万象城可罗湖地铁站直达｡国贸和东门就在附近1公里内,可以摩拜过去或打的不跳表,金光华广场和佳宁娜广场可以步行过去｡这个交通方便太无敌了! 房间从色调到灯饰到所有细小的装扮装饰都是一一挑选的,和平台展示图片一模一样,这套房子主打蓝色色调,装饰粉色的家具,营造一个温馨的家庭环境｡里面的设施设备都是全新的,提供简单厨具可以做简餐,洗漱用品都是全新的五星级酒店一次性高档套装(提供毛巾)｡ 重点强调一下房间卫生,房东找了一个有洁癖和强迫症的阿姨搞卫生,要求每次一定要搞至少1个半小时卫生,床上用品都是精心挑选超舒适的,最重要的是保证一客一换,一客一换!
space: 房间从色调到灯饰到所有细小的装扮装饰都是一一挑选的,这套房子主打蓝色色调,装饰粉色的家具,营造一个温馨的家庭环境｡ 还有就是里面的设施设备都是全新的,提供简单厨具可以做简餐,洗漱用品都是全新的五星级酒店一次性高档套装(提供压缩毛巾),我还找了一个有洁癖和强迫症的阿姨搞卫生,要求每次一定要搞1个半小时最少,床上用品都是全新高档精心挑选的,保证一客一换的,其实说到底我就想强调我的房间卫生超好! 欢迎你的入住!

neighborhood_overview: Tucked away behind the hustle and bustle of Causeway Bay, the Tai Hang neighborhood offers a laid-back alternative to all the buzz. Slow-paced yet rapidly evolving, the enclave is home to a wellspring of restaurants, vintage stores, artisanal coffee shops, and a growing lineup of design-driven boutiques.  A wander around the neighborhood will take you past the 19th-century Lin Fa Temple, sporting graceful eaves and a unique octagonal front hall. It’s here where the annual Fire Dragon Dance takes place during Mid-Autumn Festival, usually in September. A centuries-old ritual, the traditional dance features some 300 performers with incense sticks and firecrackers—believed to extinguish bad luck. Behind the temple, Lin Fa Kung Garden provides a peaceful resting spot. Nearby Victoria Park, just a few minutes’ walk northwest, offers jogging paths, tennis courts, shady corners, and Tai Chi sessions every morning.
transit: Conveniently located with grocery stores, 7-11’s, laundry services and plenty of restaurants at your doorstep meaning you don’t need to leave the area!  Public transport is highly accessible or grab one of the many cheap cabs regularly passing by.  - 5 minute walk to Tin Hau MTR or 10 minute walk to Causeway Bay MTR (Island Line)  - 5 minute walk to tram line  - 2 minute walk to bus depot  - Minimal street car parking available (paid) Notable landmarks close by: - Hong Kong stadium, home of the Hong Kong Sevens: 10 minute walk  - Victoria Park: 5 minute walk  - Causeway Bay shopping district: 10 minute walk  - Ocean Park: 20 minute cab ride
access: Access to the entire apartment.

Hello Everyone
We are very please to welcome you in one of our apartments in the amazing and wonderful Barcelona.
After working many years as sales director and account manager in a travel agency we decided to manage our own apartments and take care of our own guests. We really appreciate this new life.
We hope you will enjoy your stay in one of our apartments, selected carefully for you...

Bonjour à tous
Nous sommes très heureux de vous accueillir dans l'un de nos appartements au coeur de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone. Après avoir travaillés pendant plusieurs années comme directeur des ventes et account manager dans une agence de voyages spécialisées sur internet, Nous avons décidé de gérer nos propres appartements afin de faire profiter de Barcelone à nos hôtes en direct. C'est vraiment plus agréable et nous ne regrettons pas un instant ce choix de vie. Nous espèrons que vous profiterez pleinement de votre séjour dans l'un de ces appartements rigoureusement sélectionné pour vous.

Hola
Estamos encantados de recibirles en unos de nuestros apartamentos en esta increíble ciudad , Barcelona. Después de trabajar años como director en una agencia de viajes online y como account manager, decidímos lanzarnos y gestionar nuestros propios apartamentos. No hay un día que nos arrepentimos de haberlo hecho. Estamos muy contentos de atender nuestros propios huéspedes en estos apartamentos seleccionados para su estancia. Esperamos que disfruten de Barcelona desde unos de estos modernos y cómodos apartamentos.

Un abrazo a todos
A bientôt
Cheers

neighborhood_overview: El Raval es un barrio dinámico que ofrece exposiciones vanguardistas en el Museo de Arte Contemporáneo de Barcelona (MACBA) y el contiguo Centro de Cultura Contemporánea de Barcelona (CCCB). Los bares bohemios, las tiendas de diseño a la última y el arte callejero inundan los aledaños. En el mercado de La Boquería, situado en Las Ramblas, se vende marisco, vino y tapas. Cafeterías informales se suceden en la Rambla del Raval. El Museo Marítimo expone réplicas de embarcaciones en unos astilleros medievales. Playa a 15 minutos
notes: If you are arriving after 18:00hr please ask me ;)

name: WorldMark Kona 2 Bedroom Timeshare Condo
summary: Recently remodeled 2 bedroom unit with all amenities and the ocean just across the street.  Five minute walk on Alii Drive, finds you in old town Kailua where you can shop boutiques, dine at myriad of restaurants or simply look out over the bay. Hit the surf on boat or board, or dip under the clear water for a world-class scuba adventure.  Drive 2 1/2 hours and visit Volcanos National Park or explore the island and discover your own paradise on some of the world's most beautiful beaches.

We hope to bring a comfortable and satisfying journey to every guest. ^^

host.host_about:
Hello Everyone
We are very please to welcome you in one of our apartments in the amazing and wonderful Barcelona.
After working many years as sales director and account manager in a travel agency we decided to manage our own apartments and take care of our own guests. We really appreciate this new life.
We hope you will enjoy your stay in one of our apartments, selected carefully for you...

Bonjour à tous
Nous sommes très heureux de vous accueillir dans l'un de nos appartements au coeur de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone. Après avoir travaillés pendant plusieurs années comme directeur des ventes et account manager dans une agence de voyages spécialisées sur internet, Nous avons décidé de gérer nos propres appartements afin de faire profiter de Barcelone à nos hôtes en direct. C'est vraiment plus agréable et nous ne regrettons pas un instant ce choix de vie. Nous espèrons que vous profiterez pleinement de votre séjour dans l'un de ces appartements rigoureusement sélectionné pour vous.

Hola
Estamos encantados de recibirles en unos de nuestros apartamentos en esta increíble ciudad , Barcelona. Después de trabajar años como director en una agencia de viajes online y como account manager, decidímos lanzarnos y gestionar nuestros propios apartamentos. No hay un día que nos arrepentimos de haberlo hecho. Estamos muy contentos de atender nuestros propios huéspedes en estos apartamentos seleccionados para su estancia. Esperamos que disfruten de Barcelona desde unos de estos modernos y cómodos apartamentos.

Un abrazo a todos
A bientôt
Cheers

name: Best Location Hale in Hilo!
summary: This is a basement unit, 1000 feet from the (quiet side) of the Hilo airport. It is CENTRALLY located. My 10yo daughter and I live above (with our loopy French Bulldog, Lulu). We are always close by to answer any questions you may have. The space is a real gem as it is super quiet at night and perfectly located to explore all of Hilo's sweet spots and beyond.
space: The space is a full 2 bedroom home beneath my home.  It is within walking distance to Queen Liliuokalani Park, Hilo Bay, Wallis State Park, and Reeds Bay Beach Park.  It is a fully equipped kitchen and 2 quiet bedrooms.

The space is a full 2 bedroom home beneath my home.  It is within walking distance to Queen Liliuokalani Park, Hilo Bay, Wallis State Park, and Reeds Bay Beach Park.  It is a fully equipped kitchen and 2 quiet bedrooms. I have a 3 day a week acupuncture clinic above your space, so am close by to answer any questions, just about all the time! The neighborhood is located in a classic, old style Hilo, part of town, one block away from Big Island Candies and 2 blocks away from a super ono poke store! It is less than 2 miles from the big box store in one direction and in the opposite direction about 3 miles away is downtown Hilo proper
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is located in a classic, old style Hilo, part of town, one block away from Big Island Candies and 2 blocks away from a super ono poke store! It is less than 2 miles from the big box store in one direction and in the opposite direction about 3 miles away is downtown Hilo proper! We are also walking distance to Wiloa State Park as well as Queen Liluokulani Park and Coconut Island and Reed's Bay beach park.
transit: Walking to local sites or driving to and from.  Parking is never really an issue in Hilo Town.
interaction: I have a 3 day a week acupuncture clinic above your space, so am close by to answer any questions, just about all the time!
house_rules: - Evenings after 9pm - kitchen area - 8:30-6pm Monday, Tuesday, Thursday - Acupuncture clinic hours. * Ceiling fans must be turned off (I know, a bizarre request, but the engine creates a loud vibration above)

host.host_about: Aloha! I'm Kim.  Professionally, I am an Acupuncturist.  I've been in practice in Hilo for 15 years; lived in Hilo overall for 19 (wow, really?  That long? I say to myself...)  For pleasure I love to roller skate, lift weights, spin, surf (although that's far too infrequent these days) stretch into some yoga, spend time with my amazing 10 year old daughter and learn French or write comic book adventures.

neighborhood_overview: The Quartier des Spectacles is the city’s major cultural district. At its heart are Place des Arts, a complex with several performance halls, and the adjacent Musée d’art contemporain. Year-round outdoor events and festivals draw crowds to the Place des Festivals, where public art installations and light projections create a festive vibe. The nearby Quartier Latin has cinemas, theatres and casual bars and eateries.
notes: From WALK SCORE: 62 Rue Prince Arthur Est has a Walk Score of 99 out of 100. This location is a Walker’s Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.
transit: We are located just an 8 Minute walk to the Sherbrook station and a 9 minute walk to the Saint-Laurent station. You can take bus routs 363 and 55 at the corner and many more buses around the block. The easiest way to get to The Old Port of Montreal: Head wast on Prince Arthur 3 Minutes to Bus station Saint-Urbain / Prince-Arthur, take rout 55S to Notre-Dame / Saint-Sulpice 12 minute ride, (bus leaves every 7 min) Then head east on Notre-Dame turn right on St-Laurent and move straight into the action. Enjoy Montreal's BIXI bike rentals (summer only): Head west on Prince Arthur 2 minutes to pick up a bike and drop it at your destination.
interaction: For your convenience, we have installed a combination lock on the door, so check-in is really flexible, no need to meet up, but Mylene is always available for you before the stay and during your stay by phone, text, App, or in person.

neighborhood_overview: Diverse Brooklyn neighborhood. Central location so easy access to all. Walk to Bed Stuy restaurant row, head north to Bushwick art galleries and warehouse parties, west to Franklin Ave and Prospect Park, and Northwest to Williamsburg bars. Ten minutes on train to Barclay center, BAM, Atlantic Ave terminal shops & restaurants. Police Precinct and Laundromat on next block.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
hi guys!
A little about me...I've recently rediscovered my love for pinball. I love dining-out and love a coursed meal for special occasions.  My favorite city is Chicago, but Brooklyn has won me over too.  I'm a new Crossfit fan - can't wait to finally be able to do a pull-up  :)  I've been a teacher, a bartender, a counselor, and now I work in TV when I'm not hosting.  I love meeting new people over a well-made campari cocktail. 
Cheers!
d

reviews.comments: Daniela was the perfect host. The space I stayed in was extremely clean and comfortable. I would suggest that anyone interested in being in Brooklyn, book Daniela's space. Conveniently, her location is also in the middle of two of NYC's most efficient train lines (to Manhattan). Overall, a great place to stay.
Thank you for a lovely two weeks in your apartment in Utica Ave. I enjoyed nice and colm atmosphere.
It was a very pleasant stay at Daniela's place. It was very clean and spacious. Additionally, I enjoyed meeting the other Airbnb guests. There was also fast communications as well.
This is a wonderful place to stay Daniela is warm and welcoming and the house is clean and very comfortable. It makes a great escape from the hustle and bustle of New York when you need one.

We couldn't have wished for a better place to stay...Daniela was such a great host and her apartment is exactly how you see it in the pictures and how she describes it. The apartment offers what you need...and more! Daniela really cares about her guests and is such a lovely person. My best friend and I already visited NYC a year ago. We were looking for an alternative program this time (not the typical tourist sight seeings...). Daniela always had cool ideas about nice places and shows to visit or where to get a delicious meal. Her husband also gave us some good ideas about what to see or where to go.
Both times we visited NYC we stayed in Brooklyn. It's a very nice and safe borough with loads of things to do. Commute time to another place in Brooklyn or to Manhattan is approx. 1 hour (sometimes more, sometimes less...of course, it depends where exactly you want to go...), which is absolutely normal in New York. The subway offers good connections from Daniela's place and you can even use different lines. One subway is approx. 5-7 minutes and the other one approx. 10-15 minutes away (by foot).
We also liked that there were other two rooms (therefore other guests) in the apartment. We had some funny and interesting conversations with people from all over the world.
And last but not least: Thanks to the AC we slept very well (summers in NYC can be very hot).
Thanks again for having us, Daniela! :-)
Good location near subway

It's a beautiful place to stay and rest after a day on the streets of the Big Apple: clean, tidy with all amenities. The bedroom is really sunny, as stated in the notice. Comfortable bed, clean sheets and towels. The internet connection is very good and the kitchen is beautiful and well equipped. The neighborhood is safe as I checked because walking at night to the grocery and back underground. 
Although I did not personally know Daniela, I felt always accompanied by her. His messages with  the precise driving directions and access to the apartment and everything was concern were wonderful. I am also very grateful for the attentions of Sebastian and his advice to Mexico DF . Great city, Sebastian!
I would have loved to stay more days but definitely a place I would return. An excellent experience for my first time at Airbnb.

The place was just as described and shown in the pictures. Clean--which is super important to me! 

I didn't actually meet Daniela in person (as we only stayed one night), but she was always friendly and accommodating through messages, emails, and txts. 

Thanks for sharing the place with us, Daniela!

Daniela was so helpful! She helped me find my way in when I arrived late in the evening, and gave me a quick tour so I'd have everything I needed. She even text me a number for a car service, for my early flight at Laguardia. The apartment was super clean and I was provided with a towel, which was great because I totally forgot to bring one. I was bummed that I didn't get a chance to meet her yorkie pups, but hey, maybe next time! Thanks again, Daniela. :)

Great time visiting New York and staying in Daniela's apartment was a totally win! The room is exactly like in the picture: sunny, clean, cozy and comfortable. Whe we arrived, it was very cold for someone who hates it. I needed an extra blanket/duvet, and Daniela leave it in my bed (near the window) inmediately.
The place was warm, lots of space, in the kitchen you have a little map with spots in the neighborhood: cafes (the french was another win) and grocery shops.
This room is in Brooklyn, is not in the downtown but it was a save place. Nothing happen during our vacation. You have bus/metro stops near. You can be in Times Square in 20 minutes by train.
We have the chance to meet Daniela, very kind and helpful. Our last day, Daniela let us leave our baggage there until grabbing a taxi to go to the airport. Manwhile, we spend the day in Brooklyn. Thank you so much Daniela!

My friends and I had such a wonderful time staying at Daniela's place. The apartment was clean, cozy and conveniently located within walking distance of the A an C lines and some good places to eat. There's easy and safe parking, too, which was something we were grateful for, having driven up from NC. We went to two of the restaurants she had marked on a map that's on the fridge, and both of them were PHENOMENAL (the pizza place and Peaches). 

The room looks just like the images — the three of us stayed in the one with a single and a double bed and had plenty of room. I also appreciate a room with lots of light, so I loved having those two windows. The rest of the apartment was beautiful and clean, as well. It was a great place to come back to every night after a long (and in our case, wet and cold) day walking around the city.

Daniela is quick to respond to messages and had some helpful recommendations for things to do in the city that made our stay easier and more fun. We met in person briefly a couple of times, and she was lovely. She'll give you your space while still being available for anything you need. 

Highly recommend staying here!

Daniela was very prompt with her replies to our questions and let us leave our bags in her place after we'd checked out. The place was a convenient distance from the subway, and the place itself was nice and clean, no complaints. There were suggested places to go in the kitchen which is always nice to have. The neighborhood was nice; there were plenty of interesting cafes nearby. Overall a good stay!

Nice place, near the Subway and also the supermarket. 
Daniela is a a very Nice person and herped is a lot.
Je vous conseille vivement d aller chez Daniela. Très bonne hôte, gentil et très accueillante. L appartement est propre et est proche du métro donc très pratique.
It's a very clean and convenient place. I enjoyed my stay there.

This listing is excellent, and I would encourage anyone visiting New York City to stay here. The room is exactly as described and very comfortable. The beds are spacious and firm, and I had an enjoyable night's sleep each night of my stay. The room was relatively quiet for its location and I didn't have any trouble with noise. Access to the bathroom can be problematic at times, but there is a sign up for shower times in the kitchen that helps alleviate any problems.
The location is excellent, and is located near two subway stations with access to any part of the city. We took the train into the city each day and didn't have any problems. You can be in Manhattan in 20 minutes. We drove a car and had a little trouble finding a place to park but found one a few streets down. Make sure to check for fire hydrants and signs for restricted parking.
Daniela was an excellent host, always responding to messages quickly. She is very helpful. During our stay another guest had a problem with their room and she was quick to provide assistance and solve any problem. If you get a chance, stay with Daniela. She will make your stay perfect
Very warm welcome from host. We were very happy to stay there and felt safe. The house is easy to access the bus and subway.
It was a really nice experience. Clean. Organized. Quiet. A cool area. A good bang for ur buck. I would stay here again. Daniela was very responsive, kind and helpful. Thanks for having us.

Daniela has a really nice and clean apartment. Before my trip she gave me all details I needed to enter the apartment . Bed was really comfortable and also there was an AC in the room! The contact with Daniela was easy and also I can say that she's very helpful and nice! During my stay there she was sending messages if everything is ok ! 
I definitely would recommend her as a host! 
So don't hesitate and choose Daniela's apartment!

Lots of room to spread out with high ceilings and a full kitchen (so rare in NY!). Very convenient walk to the subway and finding street parking nearby was not difficult. Touch of road noise on the front (caution for light sleepers), but very quiet in the two bedrooms facing the back.

Dina's place is really nice. She was quick to respond to questions I had and let us check in early, which was very helpful. The only thing I found missing from the place that we wanted was a kettle. The only complaint I have is that the blankets are really thin. The place is conveniently located close to the subway which goes straight to Manhattan.
we knew nothing about Brooklyn, but now we do. not trying to be mean, but everyone that lives in Brooklyn can have Brooklyn all to them selves.

Dee accommodated us on extremely short notice after the airbnb we were living in didn't work out. Her place is big, the neighborhood has a lot of places to eat nearby. It's a short walk to the subway station. It was a great experience!

Very clean space and good find in brooklyn for large group hosting!

Dee and Dina were very fast to responding with any concerns we had. will deffinetily would stay again for our next trip to New York!
The place was amazing, of you’re looking for a place to stay that’s close to everything this is it. They helped us book at the last minute and we had no problems! Thank you again!
Done is good person who comment back quickly. The neighbors are so noisy. We could not sleep well at the weekend night. And sometime downstairs people make big sound of music.
Dina's Place was great and affordable for large groups!
Definitely recommend checking this place out! Convenient and very nice.
Very roomy!
Great place, convient and shes very accomodating

house_rules: House rules: 1. Change your shoes when you are in the house 2. Do not switch on both of the air-conditioner at the same time since it may have the possibility of shutting down. 3. You will need to turn on the red light button before getting a hot shower, turn it off when you don‘t need it anymore. 4. Switch off the air-conditioner when you leave the house 5. Try your best to keep the room clean, put the used towel into the washing machine and take away your garbage when you leaving. 6. Please put back the key and  the sim card(if you rent it) to their  original place when you leaving. 入住規則: 1. 屋內請換拖鞋 2. 請勿同時開啟兩部空調(因為比較老舊很有可能會燒掉) 3. 熱水澡前需要打開廁所外的紅色開關 4. 離開房間時請關掉空調 5. 退房時請將鑰匙以及上網電話卡(如有租借)放回原處 6. 退房時請儘量保持房間整潔,把使用過的毛巾放進洗衣機,垃圾請帶走

name: ★ RARE - gigantic Montreal nest ★ MTL life - @Prefontaine E
summary: Imagine a fully renovated apartment in one of the current best trendy neighbourhood of Montreal. This immense 7 rooms apartment on 2 levels (4 rooms on 2nd floor) is perfect for spending some time in a high quality place. Every room is equipped with a brand new high quality Queen mattress, a desk/lamp, a new TV set with Netflix, unlimited Wifi internet.  You will be seduced by the large fully equipped kitchen with 2 giant fridges (all appliances are brand new), the giant dining table, the 2 large bathrooms, and the charm of an industrial building converted into residential apartment. everything is here to make your stay a very comfortable moment : washer, dryer, high speed internet, electricity, heating, lots of storage, lots of space. Not only you will love living in this place, but you will be directly immersed within the unique vivid Promenade Ontario street ambiance.  Grab your stuff and go explore the numerous trendy bars and restaurants, the healthy food retailers, the unique mod

host.host_about:
J'habite Montréal depuis 2010 et j'adore ma ville d'adoption. On y retrouve l'ambiance chaleureuse des capitales européennes sur le plateaux et l'intensité des grandes villes américaines au centre-ville. J'aime le multiculturalisme qui brasse les personnes du monde entier. On peut goûter la cuisine de tous les pays du monde en une seule place.
Lorsque je voyage, j'aime pouvoir découvrir la place ou je vais et vivre à la manière des locaux. C'est ce que je veux offrir aux voyageurs que j'accueil : un endroit agréable, confortable propre et ou on peut passer un bon moment après une intense journée en visite.

name: O:Neat & relaxing unit, 10pax max, fast speed WiFi
summary: This is a Japanese-owned residence and our concept is Japanese hospitality. The unit is situated nearby Tsim Sha Tsui Station and K11 Shopping Mall. The guest will enjoy staying in this unit with its location being convenient and accessible for riding a bus, using the MTR, and shopping around. It is near foreign exchange shops and restaurants too. It is a good location for both sight-seeing and business trips.
space: It is a cozy unit with its own veranda perfect for bbq parties with relatives or for people who would like some fresh air after a tiring day. It also has 2 bathrooms which is very convenient for group bookings.  All amenities are prepared for the guests to use and toiletries such as shampoo, conditioner, body soap are provided too. Toothbrush are prepared according to the number of people indicated on the reservation as well as towels. There's a washing machine too which would be good for long stay bookings.
